scripts.dev-fe: export BACKEND_URL=$(./scripts/getSandboxUrl.sh) && cd packages/frontend && echo PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL $BACKEND_URL && PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL=$BACKEND_URL npm run dev
scripts.build-fe: cd packages/frontend-elm && npx elm-land build && mv dist ../../static
scripts.build-fe-cp-beta: cd packages/frontend-elm && STAGE=beta npx elm-land build && cp -R dist/ ../../static
scripts.build-fe-cp-prod: cd packages/frontend-elm && STAGE=prod npx elm-land build && cp -R dist/ ../../static
scripts.lint: cd packages/frontend && npm run lint && cd -
scripts.clean: git checkout main && git pull && npm ci
scripts.rebase: git stash && git checkout main && git pull && git checkout - && git rebase main && git stash apply
